metadata.title: CVE-2012-5854 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Heap-based buffer overflow in WeeChat 0.3.6 through 0.3.9 allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (crash or hang) and possibly executearbitrary code via crafted IRC colors that are not properly decoded.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-5854` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

weechat - 0.3.9.1-1
weechat-core - 0.3.9.1-1
weechat-curses - 0.3.9.1-1
weechat-plugins - 0.3.9.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: weechat package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.3.9.1-1').
